title: UK - Safeguarding Recommended
description: Advises raising a safeguarding incident if high-risk content is detected.
remediation: Review the content and consider raising a formal Safeguarding Incident.

title: UK - Assessment Consent Required
description: Ensures valid assessment consent is in place before finalizing.
remediation: Obtain and record assessment consent from the parent/guardian before proceeding.

title: UK - Data Minimization Check
description: Warns if excessive PII is detected in public documents.
remediation: Review document visibility. Consider restricting to 'Team' or 'Private'.
